description: Conversion of building from former school to church, including demolition of single storey outbuilding and construction of two storeyside extension with glazed link, to provide community and worship halls together with ancillary spaces. Alterations to main roof profileof original building from double-hipped to single-hipped roof with flat top and installation of four roof lights. Alterations to single storey rear extension including new fenestration and re-sizing of first floor windows to rear elevation. Associated landscaping, refuse storage and six cycle stands, together with one accessible parking space.
site_name: Hyland House School, 896 Forest Road, Walthamstow, London, E17 4AE
